<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Rejection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2418) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Warmask](/Feats.aspx?ID=2415)

**Trigger**
You fail a saving throw against an effect from your _warmask's_ magical tradition.

**Requirements**
You're wearing your _warmask_.

</column>

---

Your _warmask_ projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic. You reroll the triggering check with a +2 circumstance bonus, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse than your first roll.
name: Mask of Rejection
